mapper.insert: insert into yx_las_warehouse (id, unt,app, dptid, taskid, tasksrc, locator, shelfcode, cellid, woid, trayid, partcode,lotcode, qty, ifhalf, status) values (#{id},#{unt},#{app},#{deptid},#{taskId},#{taskSource},#{locator},#{shelfCode},#{shelfLay},#{wipEntityId},#{stockNo},#{itemCode},#{lotCode},#{quantity},#{isMultiPalForLot},0)
